results.title: Metformin for treatment of cytopenias in children and young adults with Fanconi anemia
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was safe and well tolerated in nondiabetic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Fanconi_Anemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005199 @@@FA@@@.

results.title: Metformin improves defective hematopoiesis and delays tumor formation in Fanconi anemia mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is the first compound reported to improve both of these @<m>DISEASE_Fanconi_Anemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005199 @@@FA@@@ phenotypes.
